/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with trees and buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. A few cars and a van are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the landscape. The colors in the image are muted, with shades of gray and brown dominating the scene, reflecting the urban environment and the weather conditions.
